tachyon.worker.block

Class SpaceReserver

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.worker.block.SpaceReserver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, Testable<SpaceReserver>

    public class SpaceReserver
extends Object
implements Runnable, Testable<SpaceReserver>
    SpaceReserver periodically checks if there is enough space reserved on each storage tier, if there is no enough free space on some tier, free space from it.
